## Setting up python environments 

``` bash
conda search "^python$"
conda create --name py3 python=3
``` 

``` bash
conda activate py3
python --version
  ##> Python 3.7.2
conda deactivate 
python --version
  ##> Python 3.7.1
exit
python --version
  ##> Python 2.7.12
conda info --envs
  ##> # conda environments:
  ##> #
  ##> base                  *  /home/ubuntu/anaconda3
  ##> py3                      /home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/py3

``` 

Install new package into an environment

``` bash
conda install --name py3 numpy
``` 

Remove environment

``` bash
conda remove --name py3 --all
``` 

## Updating conda

``` bash
conda update conda
conda update anaconda
``` 

Uninstall

``` bash
conda install anaconda-clean
anaconda-clean
rm -rf anaconda3
```
